<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember197" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember198" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember199"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Outdated processes and tools can make a business waste time and money. In this article, our software architect <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAc6iCwB6_pOtBaGSz6zaiXZ12U3GtkFoLc" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAc6iCwB6_pOtBaGSz6zaiXZ12U3GtkFoLc">Sergio Fiorillo</a> compiled a list of situations that indicates when a software development project becomes essential for your company.</span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-214="214" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>

<path d="M8 1a7 7 0 107 7 7 7 0 00-7-7zM3 8a5 5 0 011-3l.55.55A1.5 1.5 0 015 6.62v1.07a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 00.53.22H7v.69a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 01.22.53V13a5 5 0 01-5-5zm6.24 4.83l2-2.46a.75.75 0 00.09-.8l-.58-1.16A.76.76 0 0010 8H7v-.19a.51.51 0 01.28-.45l.38-.19a.74.74 0 01.68 0L9 7.5l.38-.7a1 1 0 00.12-.48v-.85a.78.78 0 01.21-.53l1.07-1.09a5 5 0 01-1.54 9z"></path>
</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 6 dias</span></span>

</a>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Did you know that at Hexacta we have integral career plans designed for each of the profiles that make up our projects? These accompany the professional development of each of our employees from the moment they join the company.<br/><br/>If you don’t know them yet, enter here 👉 <a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://careers.hexacta.com">careers.hexacta.com</a> and look what we have to offer!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=careerplans&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6771167964319285248">#careerplans</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=jobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6771167964319285248">#jobs</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6771167964319285248">#Hexacta</a><br/><br/>Sabías que en Hexacta contamos con planes de carrera integrales diseñados para cada uno de los perfiles que conforman nuestros proyectos? Estos acompañan el desarrollo profesional de cada uno de nuestros empleados desde su ingreso a la empresa.<br/><br/>Si todavía no los conoces ingresa acá: 👉 <a data-attribute-index="4" href="http://careers.hexacta.com">careers.hexacta.com</a> y mira lo que tenemos para ofrecerte!</span></span>
</span>

<button aria-label="Seja o primeiro a comentar: Did you know that at Hexacta we have integral career plans designed for each of the profiles that make up our projects? These accompany the professional development of each of our employees from the moment they join the company.

If you don’t know them yet, enter here 👉 careers.hexacta.com and look what we have to offer!

#careerplans #jobs #Hexacta

Sabías que en Hexacta contamos con planes de carrera integrales diseñados para cada uno de los perfiles que conforman nuestros proyectos? Estos acompañan el desarrollo profesional de cada uno de nuestros empleados desde su ingreso a la empresa.

Si todavía no los conoces ingresa acá: 👉 careers.hexacta.com y mira lo que tenemos para ofrecerte!" class="display-flex justify-space-between full-width align-items-center" type="button">

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Team innovation is one of the key factors for having a successful organization. Our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAACzy7gB7YG1On5-gAywrrAciIJJQ_K6cT4" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAACzy7gB7YG1On5-gAywrrAciIJJQ_K6cT4">Pablo Pecora</a>, shares 5 tips that will help you build an effective and innovative team. Take a look at them!</span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">A successful Sprint Review meeting requires several essential steps. Bear in mind this list with tips, tricks, and steps to follow to have better Sprint Reviews and ensure your team’s success.    <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6772192974047727616">#agile</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6772192974047727616">#scrum</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=sprintreview&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6772192974047727616">#sprintreview</a></span></span>
</span>

<span><span dir="ltr">Here our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAZPgSgBr_OIeoYL8rB1RRiMZMJI-oQ7OlQ" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAZPgSgBr_OIeoYL8rB1RRiMZMJI-oQ7OlQ">David Wasinger</a> shares three useful tips that will help you be more successful with your <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=azure&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6770751476726861824">#Azure</a> DevOps implementation. <article class="feed-shared-external-video__description-container">

<span class="break-words">
<span dir="ltr">Customized software allows new processes and technologies to be easily integrated with your existing legacy systems or applications. This way your software can be adjusted based on the needs and direction your business is taking. Check out what we can do for your business!</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">There are many reasons why <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6767104189467291648">#Scrum</a> may not be working in your projects. Watch the video and find out the most common “Buts” you should avoid if you are looking to succeed.</span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">We are celebrating! Today we celebrate 2 years of having opened our office in Bogotá, Colombia. Many goals have been achieved, and we look forward to many more. Happy anniversary Hexacta Colombia! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwarecompany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763187095113609216">#softwarecompany</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=celebrationtime&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763187095113609216">#celebrationtime</a><br/><br/>Estamos de celebración! Hoy cumplimos 2 años de haber abierto nuestra oficina en Bogotá, Colombia. Muchas metas se han conseguido y esperamos que se cumplan muchas más. ¡Feliz aniversario Hexacta Colombia!</span></span>
</span>

<h2 class="visually-hidden">
      Publicação no feed
    </h2>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Success depends in large part on the ability to offer the user of a technological solution a pleasant experience. Here are the 7 deadly sins of UX UI design you must avoid to triumph with your business. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxui&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6745042381441179648">#uxui</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxresearch&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6745042381441179648">#uxresearch</a> <br/><br/>You can also read our Blog Post here: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://lnkd.in/e2qsPMm">https://lnkd.in/e2qsPMm</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember715" tabindex="0" type="button">
<li-icon aria-label="Abrir menu de controle" class="artdeco-button__icon" role="img" type="ellipsis-horizontal-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<!-- --></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember716" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember717" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember718" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember719"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">There are countless advantages to implementing <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devops&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6764591991230664705">#DevOps</a> tactics in your organization, both for the team and the customers. Find out here the main benefits it brings from these two perspectives.</span></span>
</span>
</div>
<!-- --><!-- --></div>
<div class="ember-view" id="ember720">
<div class="feed-shared-see-translation-button feed-shared-commentary__see-translation ember-view" id="ember721"><button class="artdeco-button artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view" id="ember722"><!-- -->
<span class="artdeco-button__text">
    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>
<!-- --></div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="ivm-image-view-model ember-view" id="ember724"> <div class="display-flex ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper ivm-view-attr__img-wrapper--use-img-tag ember-view" id="ember725"><!-- --> <img alt="" class="ivm-view-attr__img--centered feed-shared-article__image lazy-image ember-view" height="600" id="ember726" loading="lazy" src="https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/sync/C4E22AQH9yUbolGR4hQ/feedshare-shrink_2048_1536/0/1612804392926?e=1617840000&amp;v=beta&amp;t=6jwwlmTaMGMfSTf4__jZJmpfs-znCaIHPlACSzUwxgs" width="600"/>

<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Over the past decade, nearshore <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6763505169301827584">#outsourcing</a> has become a critical element in the business strategies of many companies. The following infographic, created by Nearshore Americas, illustrates the major nearshore trends we can expect in 2021. Take a look!</span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Keeping <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6732350117749276672">#outsourcing</a> partnerships strong and engaged is not always simple. That is why it is important to bear in mind these tips that will help you maintain healthy relationships and succeed with your projects. <br/><br/>For more details read our Blog Post here: <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://lnkd.in/e_3puCc">https://lnkd.in/e_3puCc</a></span></span>
</span>

      </span>

<span><span aria-hidden="true">3 sem • <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="v-align-bottom" size="small" type="globe-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M8 1a7 7 0 107 7 7 7 0 00-7-7zM3 8a5 5 0 011-3l.55.55A1.5 1.5 0 015 6.62v1.07a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 00.53.22H7v.69a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 01.22.53V13a5 5 0 01-5-5zm6.24 4.83l2-2.46a.75.75 0 00.09-.8l-.58-1.16A.76.76 0 0010 8H7v-.19a.51.51 0 01.28-.45l.38-.19a.74.74 0 01.68 0L9 7.5l.38-.7a1 1 0 00.12-.48v-.85a.78.78 0 01.21-.53l1.07-1.09a5 5 0 01-1.54 9z"></path>
</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 3 semanas </span></span>
</span>
</div>
</a>
<button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Visualizar mais sobre Hexacta" class="entity-hovercard__a11y-trigger" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:10826" data-entity-hovercard-trigger="click" type="button"></button>
<button aria-label="Seguir" aria-pressed="false" class="follow ember-view feed-shared-actor__follow-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button artdeco-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button--next-to-control-menu artdeco-button--tertiary" data-control-name="actor_follow_toggle" id="ember898"> <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" size="small" type="plus-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr"> In pandemic times, where remote work has become the new normal, leveraging the <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6766032985834754048">#Cloud</a> and adopting a <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devops&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6766032985834754048">#DevOps</a> Automation mindset can help enterprises overcome challenges in product life cycles. This article tells us how!</span></span>
</span>

Watch the video to discover them! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredev&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6755899135452422144">#softwaredev</a></span></span>

<span dir="ltr">There are certain web application security risks that can affect the development process. Here we show you 5 of them every developer should have in mind in order to avoid them from the very beginning.</span>

        </span>

<span class="artdeco-button__text">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="caret-filled-down-icon" size="small" type="caret-filled-down-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

<path d="M7 9h10v1H7zm0 4h7v-1H7zm16-2a6.78 6.78 0 01-2.84 5.61L12 22v-4H8A7 7 0 018 4h8a7 7 0 017 7zm-2 0a5 5 0 00-5-5H8a5 5 0 000 10h6v2.28L19 15a4.79 4.79 0 002-4z"></path>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember1120" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember1121" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember1122"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Outsourcing software development has become the new normal for worldwide industries. If you are looking for <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6762418899674816512">#outsourcing</a> this 2021, our partner, <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY">Martin Hojman</a>, gives you some useful tips that will help you select the right partner.</span></span>
</span>
</div>

</span></button>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">If you are investing in a software product for your company, then there are four essential qualities this one should have. Make sure to incorporate the following four must-haves in your custom product! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=customsoftware&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6760247492169777152">#customsoftware</a></span></span>

<path d="M8 1a7 7 0 107 7 7 7 0 00-7-7zM3 8a5 5 0 011-3l.55.55A1.5 1.5 0 015 6.62v1.07a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 00.53.22H7v.69a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 01.22.53V13a5 5 0 01-5-5zm6.24 4.83l2-2.46a.75.75 0 00.09-.8l-.58-1.16A.76.76 0 0010 8H7v-.19a.51.51 0 01.28-.45l.38-.19a.74.74 0 01.68 0L9 7.5l.38-.7a1 1 0 00.12-.48v-.85a.78.78 0 01.21-.53l1.07-1.09a5 5 0 01-1.54 9z"></path>
</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 1 mês</span></span>
</span>
</div>
</a>
<button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Visualizar mais sobre Hexacta" class="entity-hovercard__a11y-trigger" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:10826" data-entity-hovercard-trigger="click" type="button"></button>
<button aria-label="Seguir" aria-pressed="false" class="follow ember-view feed-shared-actor__follow-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button artdeco-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button--next-to-control-menu artdeco-button--tertiary" data-control-name="actor_follow_toggle" id="ember1034"> <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" size="small" type="plus-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 9H9v5H7V9H2V7h5V2h2v5h5z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<span aria-hidden="true">Seguir</span>
</button>
</div>
<div class="feed-shared-update-v2__control-menu absolute text-align-right feed-shared-control-menu ember-view" id="ember1035"> <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember1036">
<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1037" tabindex="0" type="button">
<li-icon aria-label="Abrir menu de controle" class="artdeco-button__icon" role="img" type="ellipsis-horizontal-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<!-- --></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1038" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember1039" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember1040" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember1041"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Working remotely in software projects is not just about having the right tools and an internet connection. This idea falls apart when we start realizing the problems it brings with it. Our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAACMGV4BPru8hbPnYR9VP7tz4AZffyVA43Q" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAACMGV4BPru8hbPnYR9VP7tz4AZffyVA43Q">Diego De Sogos</a>, shares three tips for remote working successfully when developing software projects.</span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-1137="1137" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>
<div class="ember-view" id="ember1042">
<div class="feed-shared-see-translation-button feed-shared-commentary__see-translation ember-view" id="ember1043"><button class="artdeco-button artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view" id="ember1044"><!-- -->

    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">An important aspect you should take into account before <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6757706161908183041">#outsourcing</a> software is having a clear vision that represents your interests, as it will be the basis of the development. Here are some other tips to consider before outsourcing.</span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span dir="ltr">We design, build and integrate software solutions that improve business' processes. Our custom software developments are designed to meet your specific needs and requirements, helping you with your daily tasks up to the smallest detail.</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">When your business needs a technological solution, you have to decide whether to hire a generalist development company or a domain specialist. If you want your solution to be adjusted to your business needs, then a generalist one is the best option. Watch the video and find the reasons why! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwarecompany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6752613064400498688">#softwarecompany</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredev&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6752613064400498688">#softwaredev</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span><span dir="ltr">The <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6754809378550886401">#Cloud</a> is constantly evolving and there is always more to learn. In this article, our PM <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAABV79wBZP-8gnHpaEjVTV8VmOt7Z30LVh8" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAABV79wBZP-8gnHpaEjVTV8VmOt7Z30LVh8">Manuel Perez Vega</a> tells you five things you probably didn’t know about Cloud computing technology. Take a look!</span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Software <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=estimation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6753393566644527104">#estimation</a> is a very valuable and necessary practice for all team, however, is one of the hardest parts of a software project.       </span>

<span><span aria-hidden="true">3 m • <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="v-align-bottom" size="small" type="globe-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M8 1a7 7 0 107 7 7 7 0 00-7-7zM3 8a5 5 0 011-3l.55.55A1.5 1.5 0 015 6.62v1.07a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 00.53.22H7v.69a.75.75 0 00.22.53l.56.56a.75.75 0 01.22.53V13a5 5 0 01-5-5zm6.24 4.83l2-2.46a.75.75 0 00.09-.8l-.58-1.16A.76.76 0 0010 8H7v-.19a.51.51 0 01.28-.45l.38-.19a.74.74 0 01.68 0L9 7.5l.38-.7a1 1 0 00.12-.48v-.85a.78.78 0 01.21-.53l1.07-1.09a5 5 0 01-1.54 9z"></path>
</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 3 meses</span></span>
</span>
</div>
</a>

<span><span dir="ltr">Once you have decided to take the great step and digitally transform your business, there are some key aspects you should take into consideration. Follow them carefully and ensure a successful digital transformation. <br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=innovation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6742482285657948160">#innovation</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6742482285657948160">#agile</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=digitaltransformation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6742482285657948160">#digitaltransformation</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The adoption of Artificial Intelligence in businesses continues down the path of growth. Here, our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAABV79wBZP-8gnHpaEjVTV8VmOt7Z30LVh8" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAABV79wBZP-8gnHpaEjVTV8VmOt7Z30LVh8">Manuel Perez Vega</a>,  takes a quick look at some successful examples and case studies that have implemented <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=ai&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6744651832704012289">#AI</a> in a smart way.</span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Successful leadership relies on a variety of capabilities. Bear in mind these eight leadership soft skills that our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAOUwzUBwVuUhskUJ9XkeoTl1H4UH-8SS0E" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAOUwzUBwVuUhskUJ9XkeoTl1H4UH-8SS0E">Mauro Matrichuk</a>, states should be promoted within software teams to thrive in your development projects. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanagement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6742104131483377664">#projectmanagement</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softskillsdevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6742104131483377664">#softskillsdevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Cutting costs is undoubtedly important when running a business and <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6739963509930569728">#outsourcing</a> is the right way of doing it. <span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Many organizations are shifting from project-based development to product-based development in order to make the required transformation. Here, we dig into the main changes you will have to address to make the switch and get the most out of this management’s mindset! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=productdevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737355299146997760">#productdevelopment</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanagement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737355299146997760">#projectmanagement</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Are you considering hiring IT consulting services for your company? Knowing which is the right consultancy firm that will fit your needs is the harder part to define. Here our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAID8FkBtz_y-Uvut_qzmDksQiJEDaidChE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAID8FkBtz_y-Uvut_qzmDksQiJEDaidChE">Fabio Gasparri</a>, tells us a few things to consider if you decide to take the next step! <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=consulting&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737062406746386432">#consulting</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737062406746386432">#outsourcing</a></span></span>
</span>

<button aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Visualizar mais sobre Hexacta" class="entity-hovercard__a11y-trigger" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:10826" data-entity-hovercard-trigger="click" type="button"></button>
<button aria-label="Seguir" aria-pressed="false" class="follow ember-view feed-shared-actor__follow-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button artdeco-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button--next-to-control-menu artdeco-button--tertiary" data-control-name="actor_follow_toggle" id="ember1774"> <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" size="small" type="plus-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 9H9v5H7V9H2V7h5V2h2v5h5z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<span aria-hidden="true">Seguir</span>
</button>
</div>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember1777" tabindex="0" type="button">

<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">If you want to learn more about <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devops&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6752248342987849728">#DevOps</a> and why you need it, download our White Paper and get to know more about this practice that brings software development and software operations together in order to deliver better results.</span></span>

</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 3 meses</span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr"><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=microservices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6739590800981807104">#Microservices</a> architecture offers plenty of benefits, but when dealing with complexity they aren’t the best option. In this article, our PM <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAACMGV4BPru8hbPnYR9VP7tz4AZffyVA43Q" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAACMGV4BPru8hbPnYR9VP7tz4AZffyVA43Q">Diego De Sogos</a> explains Microservices’s Dark side and the implications of using it. Don't miss it!</span></span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember1969" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember1970" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember1971"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Our IT support area receives dozens of tickets every day with different kinds of problems employees have. Take a look at this article written by our Software engineers experts (the Hexacta Architecture Team), where they tell us how we can automatically classify them with <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nlp&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6733058375531184128">#NLP</a> and Machine Learning techniques.</span></span>
</span>
</div>

<h2 class="feed-shared-article__title break-words t-14 t-bold t-black">
<span dir="ltr">Text Classification</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Are you asking yourself why outsourcing fails in companies? Our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAGBHicB4Y5wkYT8Nss-EoMgCKQypVzBoZM" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAGBHicB4Y5wkYT8Nss-EoMgCKQypVzBoZM">Rodrigo Paschetta</a>, shows us three common mistakes you must avoid when choosing a software development outsourcing company. Don't miss it!<br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6734503442187915264">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6734503442187915264">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span><span dir="ltr">In recognition of our dedication to customer service and commitment to promoting excellence, Hexacta was awarded as Best Nearshore Software Company at the South America Business Awards. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcingcompany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737797910798376960">#outsourcingcompany</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737797910798376960">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=awards&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6737797910798376960">#awards</a></span></span>

Don’t miss it! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=datasharingg&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6747223647347384320">#datasharingg</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=cloud&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6747223647347384320">#cloud</a></span></span>

<span><span dir="ltr">By outsourcing your software project, we ensure your product runs and works as it should, meeting all requirements. Thanks to our testing process we are able to foresee potential issues and avoid risks. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6732678857775742976">#software</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6732678857775742976">#outsourcing</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Throughout many years in the market, we have worked on diverse projects for a wide variety of industries. Outsource and get direct access to highly experienced professionals that will make your project progress flawlessly. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6730163110038044672">#software</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6730163110038044672">#outsourcing</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">What are Smart Contracts and how are they related to Blockchain technology? Here our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAGeyfwBGtH0CngVbCGGzi_zHyXnjwzAgpg" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAGeyfwBGtH0CngVbCGGzi_zHyXnjwzAgpg">Martin Buttazzi</a> explains what the term means and outlines some benefits Smart Contracts have to offer to companies around the world.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=smartcontracts&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6729430361702494208">#smartcontracts</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=blockchain&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6729430361702494208">#blockchain</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember2188" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember2189" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember2190"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">UX/UI Design plays a fundamental role in software development for creating successful products. However, it can happen that mistakes are made affecting the whole project. That is why here we show you the seven deadly sins of <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxui&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6727270655332532224">#uxui</a> design you need to avoid. Watch the video!<br/><br/>You can also read our article: <a data-attribute-index="1" href="http://bit.ly/7SinsUXUI">http://bit.ly/7SinsUXUI</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Tracking your team’s work with <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=azure&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6726893098150043648">#Azure</a> DevOps can be very productive. Here our PM, <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAZPgSgBr_OIeoYL8rB1RRiMZMJI-oQ7OlQ" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAZPgSgBr_OIeoYL8rB1RRiMZMJI-oQ7OlQ">David Wasinger</a> explains some concepts that will help you understand how this tool functions. Take a look!<br/> <br/><a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=microsoft&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6726893098150043648">#microsoft</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=azure&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6726893098150043648">#azure</a> <a data-attribute-index="5" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=devops&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6726893098150043648">#devops</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span><span dir="ltr">Scope creep is a common problem in project management that can end up affecting your project and business as a whole. Check out this infographic and see what the main causes of scope creep are and four good strategies to avoid it.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scopecreep&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6724697620746436608">#scopecreep</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">From self-driving cars to AI-driven customer service chatbots, there seems to be no end to the ways <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=automation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6719304455050842112">#automation</a> technology can be manifested in the modern world. Take a look at this article written by our partner <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78">Juan Navarro</a>, and discover why 2020 may be the year of Covid-19 and automation.</span></span>
</span>

<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember2567" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember2568" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember2569" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember2570"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">We are proud to have been part of "CuidAR", a new mobile app available to all citizens that allows for better control and diagnosis of the Covid-19 situation. Hexacta, together with the Argentine government and 7 other companies from <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:672609" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/cessi-camara-de-la-industria-argentina-del-software/">CESSI - Cámara de la Industria Argentina del Software</a>, worked day and night for the design and development of this initiative. <br/>Thanks to the commitment and effort of all the professionals who were involved in this project, after 13 days we were able to achieve the goal!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6660588164161294338">#Covid</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6660588164161294338">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6660588164161294338">#software</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">By hiring a software development company you get reliable and cost-effective customized solutions without the need of worrying about the recruiting and hiring processes, among other benefits. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6727623732766023680">#software</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6727623732766023680">#outsourcing</a></span></span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember2487" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember2488" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember2489"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Where we have little flow of information, a simple request to obtain it is enough. But when we have large volumes of data, streams can give us certain benefits to achieve an efficient application with good response times. What happens when we also want to manipulate objects within our stream? See the answer in this recent article written by our Hexacta Architecture Team (HAT).<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nodejs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6715305492236836864">#nodejs</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=javascript&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6715305492236836864">#javascript</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-2620="2620" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<span class="artdeco-button__text">
    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember2539" tabindex="0" type="button">
<li-icon aria-label="Abrir menu de controle" class="artdeco-button__icon" role="img" type="ellipsis-horizontal-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">While many businesses understand the need to invest in <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=ux&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6714593792382554112">#UX</a> design for their digital solutions, some still fail to recognize the importance of user research. Look out why this is an essential stage within any software development and start developing successful projects.  <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxresearch&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6714593792382554112">#uxresearch</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxui&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6714593792382554112">#uxui</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember2714" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember2715" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember2716"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">How can you improve the effectiveness of your software development team? Here our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE">Javier López de Lagar</a>, shares six ways of boosting your team’s skills so that they can work more productively and get better results. Take a look!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=bestpractices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6714229085683425281">#bestpractices</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=skills&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6714229085683425281">#skills</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwareteams&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6714229085683425281">#softwareteams</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember2660" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember2661" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember2662"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">In our 20 years of experience and guided by an Agile mentality, we have acquired a versatile way of working. We assign dedicated teams to each of our client projects, composed of different profiles according to each need. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6712391702084149248">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">If you are a <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=startup&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6712069949365501953">#startup</a> and want to develop your project faster and more cost-efficiently, then outsourcing your software product development might be the best option. Instead of devoting time and effort to solve technical problems, focus on making your business grow. Take a look at the advantages you get with this!</span></span>
</span>

<span class="artdeco-button__text">
<div class="artdeco-button__text align-items-center">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" type="like-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

          Gostei
        </span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">From the methodology perspective, metrics and KPI evaluations are a few of the last frontiers in the process for continuous improvement. Here our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAcI32gB16ufhNq4ojGaJdtunXyBn308vb4" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAcI32gB16ufhNq4ojGaJdtunXyBn308vb4">Lucas Napoli</a>, writes about some KPIs in software development that teams should be aware of. Take a look!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=metrics&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6716768736684060672">#metrics</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=kpis&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6716768736684060672">#kpis</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6716768736684060672">#agile</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Thanks to our commitment to providing excellent software development services, we have been included in the Best of The Global Outsourcing 100 list by the IAOP® in recent years. This recognition encourages us to keep on learning and boosting our work performance. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709893069585620992">#Hexacta20Years</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcingcompany&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709893069585620992">#outsourcingcompany</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709167836893376515">#COVID</a>-19 pandemic is far from over but amid the uncertainty and stress, the economy is shifting from crisis mode to recovery. For some businesses, this is a time to seize new opportunities for the future and make bold changes for a new and better normal. Take a look at our most recent article written by our partner <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY">Martin Hojman</a>.</span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Outsourcing to a nearshore software company enables you to work with a team with English proficiency, cultural affinity, and time-zone convenience no matter if you are in the US or Europe. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6720019477943107584">#software</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6720019477943107584">#outsourcing</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Excellence and quality have always been distinguishing factors for us since our early beginnings. Throughout the years, we have worked to increase efficiency and improve our processes, and 2020 was not the exception as Hexacta received one more time the ISO 9001: 2015 recertification! <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6707343374040535040">#Hexacta20Years</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=iso9001&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6707343374040535040">#iso9001</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Planning to <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsource&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6706979434135650304">#outsource</a> your software project? Here are 6 common mistakes businesses make when working with an outsourced software team that you should be aware of before making the great step. Watch this video!<br/><br/><br/>To know more about what you should be doing instead you can also read our article: <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://lnkd.in/ew-9Unt">https://lnkd.in/ew-9Unt</a></span></span>

<div class="ember-view" id="ember3067"><div class="video-s-loader ember-view" id="ember3068"><a class="app-aware-link tap-target video-s-loader__play-link play-video" href="https://youtu.be/TeVCvN9cXzg" target="_blank">
<div class="video-s-loader__thumbnail-container ember-view" id="ember3070"> <div aria-label="What NOT to do when working with an outsourced team" class="video-s-loader__thumbnail ember-view" id="ember3071" style=""> <span class="visually-hidden">What NOT to do when working with an outsourced team</span>
<!-- --></div>

<button aria-label="Gostar da publicação de Hexacta" aria-pressed="false" class="react-button__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--4 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view" id="ember3018"><!-- -->
<span class="artdeco-button__text">
<div class="artdeco-button__text align-items-center">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" type="like-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">

</svg></li-icon>
<span aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__text react-button__text">
          Gostei
        </span>
</div>
</span></button>

<span><span dir="ltr">We are thrilled to announce that Clutch has recently included Hexacta into its 2020 list of Top B2B Companies in Argentina. Being recognized as one of the best companies that provide nearshore services in Latin America is evidence of our dedication to customer satisfaction and commitment to producing high-quality results for our clients. <span><span dir="ltr">Not sure why you should outsource your mobile app development? In this article written by our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAC44C8BIiZGUUGuBEndjNap-piGoe-Gjow" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAC44C8BIiZGUUGuBEndjNap-piGoe-Gjow">Paola Moguillansky</a>, we outline 5 top benefits that will really convince you. Thanks to the HAT Team, we enhance quality service and engineer team productivity. <span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">As companies are increasingly going digital, the need for exceptional user experience design is crucial. If you have come to the decision to outsource this kind of service, here is a guide with a few aspects you shouldn’t omit. Check them out! <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxui&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709523620881850368">#uxui</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=userexperience&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709523620881850368">#userexperience</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6709523620881850368">#outsourcing</a></span></span>
</span>

<h2 class="feed-shared-article__title break-words t-14 t-bold t-black">
<span dir="ltr">What not to miss when outsourcing UX design</span>
</h2>

                    hexacta.com • 6 min de leitura

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Scrum or Kanban? Which one is the better approach? While both are Agile methodologies, there are still distinctive characteristics that differentiate them. Learn more about each and how to choose the right one for your project. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6694297941491949568">#scrum</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=kanban&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6694297941491949568">#kanban</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6694297941491949568">#agile</a></span></span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember3360" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember3361" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember3362"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Life as we know it has completely changed thanks to COVID-19 and won’t likely return to the way it was. With that in mind, here our partner <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78">Juan Navarro</a> tells us how things will look like in the post-pandemic world. Take a look!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6699007230739587072">#covid</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=digitaltransformations&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6699007230739587072">#digitaltransformations</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=business&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6699007230739587072">#business</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Remote work is on the rise and has definitely come to stay. However, when managing virtual teams, there are some common challenges leaders have to face. Read this article written by our Project Manager <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAD0Xw0BiBGJ6VegcZHP6ECPX56xx8rTgTM" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAD0Xw0BiBGJ6VegcZHP6ECPX56xx8rTgTM">Eric Delahaye</a> and learn how to overcome them.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanagement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6701555203071651840">#projectmanagement</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=remotework&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6701555203071651840">#remotework</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=virtualteams&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6701555203071651840">#virtualteams</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Did you know that at Hexacta we have integral career plans designed for each of the profiles that make up our projects? These accompany the professional development of each of our employees from the moment they join the company.<br/><br/>If you don’t know them yet, enter here 👉<a data-attribute-index="3" href="http://careers.hexacta.com">careers.hexacta.com</a> and look what we have to offer!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=careerplans&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6705179424465190912">#careerplans</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=jobs&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6705179424465190912">#jobs</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6705179424465190912">#Hexacta</a><br/><br/>Sabías que en Hexacta contamos con planes de carrera integrales diseñados para cada uno de los perfiles que conforman nuestros proyectos? Estos acompañan el desarrollo profesional de cada uno de nuestros empleados desde su ingreso a la empresa.<br/><br/>Si todavía no los conoces ingresa acá:  👉<a data-attribute-index="4" href="http://careers.hexacta.com">careers.hexacta.com</a> y mira lo que tenemos para ofrecerte!</span></span>

<div class="social-details-first-prompt-block">
<button aria-label="Seja o primeiro a comentar: Did you know that at Hexacta we have integral career plans designed for each of the profiles that make up our projects? These accompany the professional development of each of our employees from the moment they join the company.

If you don’t know them yet, enter here 👉careers.hexacta.com and look what we have to offer!

#careerplans #jobs #Hexacta

Sabías que en Hexacta contamos con planes de carrera integrales diseñados para cada uno de los perfiles que conforman nuestros proyectos? Estos acompañan el desarrollo profesional de cada uno de nuestros empleados desde su ingreso a la empresa.

Si todavía no los conoces ingresa acá:  👉careers.hexacta.com y mira lo que tenemos para ofrecerte!" class="display-flex justify-space-between full-width align-items-center" type="button">
<p class="t-12 t-black t-normal">Seja o primeiro a comentar</p>
</button>

<h2 class="visually-hidden">
      Publicação no feed
    </h2>

<span><span dir="ltr">In these 20 years, we have witnessed the evolution of the development methodologies we work with, both Agile and traditional, and learned how to get the best out of each one according to the needs of each client and the specifications of the project. Learn more about our methodologies here. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6699735379605553152">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>

<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember3525" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember3526" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember3527" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember3528"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">After many years of working with <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6691398919357816832">#Agile</a> and being a witness to its results, here our PM <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAOUwzUBwVuUhskUJ9XkeoTl1H4UH-8SS0E" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAOUwzUBwVuUhskUJ9XkeoTl1H4UH-8SS0E">Mauro Matrichuk</a> enumerates the main mistakes that usually come up when implementing this methodology. Take a look at some of the reasons why Agile fails within the software projects.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6691398919357816832">#agile</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agilemethodology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6691398919357816832">#agilemethodology</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span><span dir="ltr">Given the difficult situation caused by the COVID-19 pandemic, Hexacta has been committed to several initiatives and software development projects in order to help the most affected communities and organizations. Here is an overview of some of those initiatives we have collaborated with. Take a look!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=corporatesocialresponsibility&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6704085789946515456">#corporatesocialresponsibility</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6704085789946515456">#covid</a></span></span>

<span class="reactions-react-button feed-shared-social-action-bar__action-button">
<!-- -->
<button aria-label="Gostar da publicação de Hexacta" aria-pressed="false" class="react-button__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--4 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view" id="ember3457"><!-- -->
<span class="artdeco-button__text">
<div class="artdeco-button__text align-items-center">
<li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" type="like-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M19.46 11l-3.91-3.91a7 7 0 01-1.69-2.74l-.49-1.47A2.76 2.76 0 0010.76 1 2.75 2.75 0 008 3.74v1.12a9.19 9.19 0 00.46 2.85L8.89 9H4.12A2.12 2.12 0 002 11.12a2.16 2.16 0 00.92 1.76A2.11 2.11 0 002 14.62a2.14 2.14 0 001.28 2 2 2 0 00-.28 1 2.12 2.12 0 002 2.12v.14A2.12 2.12 0 007.12 22h7.49a8.08 8.08 0 003.58-.84l.31-.16H21V11zM19 19h-1l-.73.37a6.14 6.14 0 01-2.69.63H7.72a1 1 0 01-1-.72l-.25-.87-.85-.41A1 1 0 015 17l.17-1-.76-.74A1 1 0 014.27 14l.66-1.09-.73-1.1a.49.49 0 01.08-.7.48.48 0 01.34-.11h7.05l-1.31-3.92A7 7 0 0110 4.86V3.75a.77.77 0 01.75-.75.75.75 0 01.71.51L12 5a9 9 0 002.13 3.5l4.5 4.5H19z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>

</svg></li-icon> </span><span class="visually-hidden">Há 7 meses</span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Effective software projects depend greatly on someone with great leadership skills. Without a good leader, a project is unlikely to be completed successfully. If you want to succeed and take your projects to another level, work on boosting the following tactics. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectleadership&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6696827294721331201">#projectleadership</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=software&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6696827294721331201">#software</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Blockchain solutions are not only limited to the exchange of cryptocurrencies. There are numerous of other benefits that this technology can present to businesses around the world. Discover why your business might want to consider blockchain from now on. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=blockchain&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6689247870052302848">#blockchain</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=trends&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6689247870052302848">#trends</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Many companies are turning to nearshoring as a solution to the problems of hyper-globalized and vulnerable production chains. But for unlocking this new call of globalization, digital transformation is key for making it all work. Read this article written by our partner <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAID8FkBtz_y-Uvut_qzmDksQiJEDaidChE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAID8FkBtz_y-Uvut_qzmDksQiJEDaidChE">Fabio Gasparri</a> and learn more about it!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshoring&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6688862810849497088">#nearshoring</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=digitaltransformations&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6688862810849497088">#digitaltransformations</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Implementing geographically distributed work teams can involve certain challenges. However, if they are well addressed they can end up representing great opportunities, especially now that working with distributed teams has proven to be essential to continue business. Take a look and make the most out of distributed development teams!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=virtualteams&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6691768895868596224">#virtualteams</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6691768895868596224">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanagement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6691768895868596224">#projectmanagement</a></span></span>

<span><span dir="ltr">What does <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scala&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6693939853131866114">#Scala</a> have that has been capturing the attention among software projects? <span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Our QA &amp; software testing services provide end-to-end solutions, assuring quality, reducing costs, and driving continuous improvement. Our services fulfill all your needs and verify that your software is secure, reliable and of high quality. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=testing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6692122886997651456">#testing</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=services&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6692122886997651456">#services</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">As the world makes plans to open up businesses and restart its economies, people are wondering, when will things get back to normal, and when will we go back to work? While nobody has a definitive answer yet, here our partner <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78">Juan Navarro</a> shares with us a few insights to take into consideration. Do not miss it!</span></span>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4051" tabindex="0" type="button">
<li-icon aria-label="Abrir menu de controle" class="artdeco-button__icon" role="img" type="ellipsis-horizontal-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Without a good software leader, a project is unlikely to be completed successfully. Although tactics, techniques, and skills regarding leadership change over the years, some of them are always in the climb of the hill. Know those 5 skills that a good project leader must have.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=leadership&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6679076961567944706">#leadership</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectleader&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6679076961567944706">#projectleader</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Which are the most important technological trends for the years to come? Here our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE">Javier López de Lagar</a>, shares a list of the technologies that will dominate the near future. Take a look at them!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=technology&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6696473473734246400">#technology</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=trends&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6696473473734246400">#trends</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=business&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6696473473734246400">#business</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Even nowadays, where Agile predominates over traditional frameworks, there are some instances where Waterfall might be a more appropriate methodology approach to your software project. Get to know the conditions you have to meet for that to happen.  <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaremethodologies&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6681609490229403648">#softwaremethodologies</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=waterfall&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6681609490229403648">#waterfall</a></span></span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember4304" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember4305" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember4306"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">If your organization has temporary needs to fill, staff augmentation could be the right solution for your team. Here our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY">Martin Hojman</a> shares some key signs that tell this hiring model might be the right one for your business. Don’t miss it!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=staffaugmentation&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6681252036694048768">#staffaugmentation</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6681252036694048768">#outsourcing</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">We are pleased to announce that we successfully achieved the recertification of the ISO 9001:2015 standard!<br/>This certification demonstrates that our company works consistently to deliver high-quality products and services that meet our customer’s requirements.<br/>To adapt to the current times, the audit was carried out remotely, where the QA &amp; Methodology area and all the departments of the company involved demonstrated a significant commitment throughout the whole process.<br/><br/> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredev&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6679103498380042240">#softwaredev</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=qualitymanagement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6679103498380042240">#qualitymanagement</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Design Sprint is a methodology used in the design process that helps to evaluate and test products and services prior to launch. These are broken out into five phases that take place over the five-day Sprint. Take a look at the whole process here! <br/><br/>You can also read our Blog Post: <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://lnkd.in/dTJvsUm">https://lnkd.in/dTJvsUm</a><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=designsprint&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6676537958843092992">#designsprint</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=uxui&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6676537958843092992">#uxui</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The future of design will adapt and change in a post-pandemic world. Here our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAACzy7gB7YG1On5-gAywrrAciIJJQ_K6cT4" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAACzy7gB7YG1On5-gAywrrAciIJJQ_K6cT4">Pablo Pecora</a> shares some product design trends you should know about. Take a look at them!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=design&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6678716955161059328">#design</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=trends&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6678716955161059328">#trends</a></span></span>
</span>
