<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">What are the lessons we can learn from what a Project Manager has been through since the beginning of his professional path? Take a look at these five lessons and keep them in mind. They will help you to avoid some common mistakes! <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanager&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671465071681515520">#projectmanager</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671465071681515520">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The Covid outbreak has already changed the business landscape forever, making some corporations stronger than before. Here our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE">Javier López de Lagar</a>, shares with us some of the ways Covid-19 is prompting companies to make changes and, as a result, strengthen their business.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671117067741089792">#covid</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=trends2020&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6671117067741089792">#trends2020</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Our Hexacta Architecture Team has recently published an interesting article based on research they did on Object Detection for Machine Learning, taking and comparing today's existing tools. Take a look at this HAT’s Blog Post and learn more about it.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=machinelearning&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6669668133738950656">#machinelearning</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">As the impact of the Covid-19 outbreak continues to grow, business leaders across the world find themselves dealing with their own corporate crisis. Our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAAMIuMBEV19kiIV6jjlPz1CTeB71ZQDW78">Juan Navarro</a>, shares three main considerations that companies should be applying when reviewing their crisis management plan. Don't miss this reading!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6666032653482946560">#covid</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=leadership&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6666032653482946560">#leadership</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=management&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6666032653482946560">#management</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Choosing the right software architecture is critical for the overall success of the product. Learn the differences between the three most popular architectures and find out when it is more convenient to use each of them. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=microservices&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6674000911645335552">#microservices</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=serverless&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6674000911645335552">#serverless</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=monolith&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6674000911645335552">#monolith</a></span></span>
</span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember4498" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember4499" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember4500"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Over the years we have received many recognitions and awards from several well-known organizations around the world. As a big-year end, in 2019 Hexacta won a Golden Sadosky award, one of the most prestigious of the argentine IT industry. This has been a recognition for our constant effort and contribution to the software industry. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6666750306598166528">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-4626="4626" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Over the years, we have been working on our plan of becoming a regional leader in software development. That's why we opened dev centers in Brazil and Uruguay, and most recently, in 2019, we opened a new office in Colombia. We've been decided to have a strong presence in the region. Learn more about our offices &amp; development centers.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6669285172384436224">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Testing is essential for having a high-quality software product. That’s why in this article we share a set of best practices and tools every tester should implement into their everyday work to perform testing in the best way. Take a look at them!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=testing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6676189317129351168">#testing</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6676189317129351168">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The current COVID crisis highlights the importance of system resilience, as IT and business leaders must ensure that their organizations can continue to operate through this disruption by quickly responding to critical systems vulnerabilities. Here our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAID8FkBtz_y-Uvut_qzmDksQiJEDaidChE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAID8FkBtz_y-Uvut_qzmDksQiJEDaidChE">Fabio Gasparri</a> goes deeper into the topic. Take a look at it!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6673645220296462337">#covid</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=projectmanagement&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6673645220296462337">#projectmanagement</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<button aria-label="Seguir" aria-pressed="false" class="follow ember-view feed-shared-actor__follow-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button artdeco-button feed-shared-update-v2__follow-button--next-to-control-menu artdeco-button--tertiary" data-control-name="actor_follow_toggle" id="ember4879"> <li-icon aria-hidden="true" class="artdeco-button__icon" size="small" type="plus-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="16x16" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="16" viewbox="0 0 16 16" width="16" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 9H9v5H7V9H2V7h5V2h2v5h5z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<span aria-hidden="true">Seguir</span>
</button>
</div>
<div class="feed-shared-update-v2__control-menu absolute text-align-right feed-shared-control-menu ember-view" id="ember4880"> <div class="artdeco-dropdown artdeco-dropdown--placement-bottom artdeco-dropdown--justification-right ember-view" id="ember4881">
<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4882" tabindex="0" type="button">
<li-icon aria-label="Abrir menu de controle" class="artdeco-button__icon" role="img" type="ellipsis-horizontal-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<!-- --></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4883" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember4884" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember4885" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember4886"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The Covid-19 pandemic has resulted in many people working from home. So you might be wondering how you can still remain productive at home. Here our PM, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAGrEsoBqBCkGY8ExaRN29Go6GwQOloRdXs" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAGrEsoBqBCkGY8ExaRN29Go6GwQOloRdXs">Pablo Viola</a>, shares some tips for working remotely that will help you get your work done as well as maintain your mental well-being. Don’t miss it!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workingfromhome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658425041430077440">#WorkingFromHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658425041430077440">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6658425041430077440">#covid</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-4931="4931" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember5076" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember5077" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember5078"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Since our early beginnings, we have been committed to various corporate social responsibility programs, collaborating with more than 100 institutions. We are proud to say that throughout these 20 years, more than 300 people from Hexacta have participated in these solidarity projects, accounting for a total of approximately 15,000 working hours. Know more about our CSR initiatives!<br/><br/> <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6676902354677194752">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-5094="5094" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4963" tabindex="0" type="button">
<li-icon aria-label="Abrir menu de controle" class="artdeco-button__icon" role="img" type="ellipsis-horizontal-icon"><svg class="mercado-match" data-supported-dps="24x24" fill="currentColor" focusable="false" height="24" viewbox="0 0 24 24" width="24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
<path d="M14 12a2 2 0 11-2-2 2 2 0 012 2zM4 10a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2zm16 0a2 2 0 102 2 2 2 0 00-2-2z"></path>
</svg></li-icon>
<!-- --></button>
<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember4964" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember4965" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember4966" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember4967"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">For many companies, the COVID-19 has meant a real challenge as they were forced to adapt to new ways of working. From this pandemic, however, we can learn some valuable lessons to keep us productive during these tough times. Here are five things we can learn from and how to apply them to software development. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646171093377826816">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=productive&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646171093377826816">#Productive</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=management&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646171093377826816">#management</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span dir="ltr">A proper UX/UI design can dramatically change the face of a business and produce a major return on investment, but this is not the only benefit. Take a look at this article and learn 5 reasons why you should invest in good UX/UI design.</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Along with Hexacta, seven other companies participated in the design and development of a software project that aims to help the current situation that Argentina is facing with the Covid-19 pandemic. "CuidAR", the new mobile app, allows users to do a self-diagnose of Coronavirus symptoms as well as many other functions. Know more about this initiative!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=covid&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6660623242195202048">#Covid</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=apps&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6660623242195202048">#apps</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6660623242195202048">#WeStayAtHome</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember5215" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember5216" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember5217"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">In the context of Agile methodologies where urgency and request for changes abound, having a software with high-quality standards is sometimes hard to achieve. That's why adopting the set of practices defined under the software craftsmanship movement will help you add quality to your software product. Take a look at them!<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agilesoftwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6663867227508486144">#agilesoftwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-5233="5233" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<span dir="ltr">Going beyond Agile: Why software craftsmanship is where you should aim</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">While all industries have been affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, some of them have been hit hardest. Here, our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAABZ66kB6JoiI20pSJ3TwGUPAHeXLWsIUCY">Martin Hojman</a>, shows us three of the most affected industries and tells how they should reinvent themselves to mitigate the economic effects on their businesses. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651559569380167680">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>

      Publicação no feed
    </h2>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember5348" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember5349" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember5350"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Understanding the theory behind <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6656254289700274177">#Scrum</a> is easy, but what about putting it into practice? If you are not sure how to do it, get started by following these steps! <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6656254289700274177">#agile</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6656254289700274177">#scrum</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6656254289700274177">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-5392="5392" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Having two decades of experience developing innovation at the cornerstone of our custom software solutions, we have successfully finished during these years over 380 projects with more than 250 customers across the globe. This year, we count with over 50 active clients and 70 ongoing projects. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6664236936707874817">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Whether working remotely is a temporary situation due the current pandemic, it helps to know a few best practices when working with virtual teams. Here we share some important tips for getting used to a remote working environment. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648286414872068096">#Hexacta20Years</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workingfromhome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648286414872068096">#WorkingFromHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648286414872068096">#WeStayAtHome</a></span></span>
</span>

      Publicação no feed

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember5267" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember5268" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember5269"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">At Hexacta, we have an elite team that is focused on researching new technologies, frameworks, and software trends. It's the Hexacta Architecture Team (HAT) and they also have their own space where they share their knowledge. Take a look at the most recent article of the HAT's Blog and learn about <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=blazor&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646851944885350400">#Blazor</a>, a new <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=framework&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646851944885350400">#framework</a> for building interactive web apps. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646851944885350400">#Hexacta20Years</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646851944885350400">#softwaredevelopment</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaresolutions&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646851944885350400">#softwaresolutions</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Offering the highest quality standards implies we work on our own improvement. That's why Hexacta became a Silver Partner of the International Software Testing Qualifications Board, which ensures our testers have the right qualifications to offer the best software products. <br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=testing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6656612577805688832">#testing</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6656612577805688832">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember5433" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember5434" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember5435"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Clustering is an unsupervised Machine Learning task that automatically divides data into clusters or groups of similar items helping find some structure in chaos. Take a look at this article of the HAT’s Blog and learn more about this interesting technique.<br/><br/><a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=machinelearning&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6654040612725149696">#machinelearning</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=datascience&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6654040612725149696">#datascience</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The more popular <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=scrum&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651190117270642688">#Scrum</a> becomes, the more misconceptions are spread with it. Here is a review of the most common myths about Scrum methodology and the truths behind them. Don't miss it! <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651190117270642688">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember5598" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember5599" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember5600"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Recently our partner <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniCompany:395536" data-entity-type="MINI_COMPANY" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/accelerance-inc/">Accelerance</a> traveled to South America and visited our offices in Buenos Aires. During their stay, we participated in their podcast where the Project Managers <a data-attribute-index="2" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAACzy7gB7YG1On5-gAywrrAciIJJQ_K6cT4" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAACzy7gB7YG1On5-gAywrrAciIJJQ_K6cT4">Pablo Pecora</a> and <a data-attribute-index="4" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAACcWHD4BSuXoSsjqApFJCIXRabDRqyYP3gY" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAACcWHD4BSuXoSsjqApFJCIXRabDRqyYP3gY">Agustín Tobio Corneu</a> were interviewed on  <a data-attribute-index="6" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agile&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650833699745132544">#Agile</a> and  <a data-attribute-index="7" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=agility&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650833699745132544">#Agility</a>. Take a look at the episode! <a data-attribute-index="8" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650833699745132544">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">As part of our quality policy and commitment to continuous improvement, in 2019 Hexacta got the ISO 9001:2015 recertification, an international standard that focuses on the elements of quality management that a company must have. Learn more about all of our certifications <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6649031847156215808">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Code review is essential when working on a software project as it can improve the product quality and the communication skills within teamwork. Here we tell you some reasons why it is so important in any software project. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646120801076592640">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Many organizations around the world are transferring their IT and software development operations to third parties. Get this White Paper written by our partner, <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE">Javier López de Lagar</a>, and find out why this might be the perfect choice for your business. <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6645743329608810497">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6645743329608810497">#softwaredevelopment</a> <a data-attribute-index="4" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6645743329608810497">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">When we talk about agile methodologies, we can’t forget about <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=kanban&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653355826968870912">#Kanban</a>. Read this Blog Post written by our PM <a data-attribute-index="1" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAx0Z2UB3-sgJ3y4EcAK6XSxlrAxEZUJgIw" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAx0Z2UB3-sgJ3y4EcAK6XSxlrAxEZUJgIw">Matias De Antoni</a> and learn all about this methodology and the challenges you will need to overcome if you decide to implement it. <br/><a data-attribute-index="3" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653355826968870912">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

Our alliances with these organizations guarantee our clients our high-class services. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6643947926517362688">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr"> Working and handling outsourced teams it is not just an easy task. Here our partner <a data-attribute-index="0" data-entity-hovercard-id="urn:li:fs_miniProfile:ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE" data-entity-type="MINI_PROFILE" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAAAB2NfIBIy9-oaprQ9pYIGyEWDkGTnty_mE">Javier López de Lagar</a> selected some of the most common mistakes businesses make when working with outsourced software teams. Take a look at them! <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=hexacta20years&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6643204408500899840">#Hexacta20Years</a></span></span>
</span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6008" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6009" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6010"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">In turbulent times, where many industries around the world have stopped some of their processes, services exports seem to be at risk. According to the Chamber of Businesses of Software and Information Services (CESSI), the Argentine software industry exports 40% of what it produces, which reaffirms that the country has the necessary experience and capabilities to offer technological services worldwide. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6652948269745917952">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6652948269745917952">#outsourcing</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember6060" tabindex="0" type="button">

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6062" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6063" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6064"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Speedy communication and real-time collaboration are essential for maintaining the levels of efficiency and productivity your business requires. While the world adapts to these shaking times, and overcome the challenges that COVID-19 has put into the table, being continually close thanks to the short time difference, will ensure that the pace of the development process won't be affected. Hiring a nearshore company with similar time zones will impact positively on how your project evolves. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651859206657892353">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651859206657892353">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651859206657892353">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6116" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6117" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6118"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">The difficult situation the world is living nowadays has opened the need to manage budget wisely due to the uncertain future. Hiring a nearshore company that offers you very competitive and lower rates, without compromising quality, is essential. Take into account that thanks to the cultural affinity, they also can understand your current needs better and be the consultant company you are in need of. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651502943323381760">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651502943323381760">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651502943323381760">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Even in these days, you can still count on friends and family. It can be difficult to be in quarantine for 14 days, but it will be more difficult to not get in touch with your loved ones. Take some time during the day -maybe lunchtime- to phonecall someone. This will be a great break and it will give you energy to continue with your daily job. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650771950375366656">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workingremotely&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650771950375366656">#workingremotely</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6222" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6223" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6224"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Connectivity is the clue when it comes to working with remote teams. Make sure your WiFi connection and Internet provider works perfectly. Think about increasing velocity if your project needs it or make sure the IT team of your company will technically respond as if it was at the office. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650412638780051457">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workfromhome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6650412638780051457">#workfromhome</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6168" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6169" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6170"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">According to the EF 2019 English Proficiency Index, Argentina ranks as the top country in Latin America, and it also positions itself above countries like China, Russia or India. On the other hand, it has been also chosen by Coursera as the country with the best technological skills in the world. Taking into account the current events, this might be the moment to evaluate having a nearshore partner that will offer you not only constant and fluid communication, but the best quality in what they are working on. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653304897708060672">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653304897708060672">#nearshore</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<button aria-expanded="false" class="feed-shared-control-menu__trigger artdeco-button artdeco-button--tertiary artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--1 artdeco-button--circle artdeco-dropdown__trigger artdeco-dropdown__trigger--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember6247" tabindex="0" type="button">

<div aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-control-menu__content artdeco-dropdown__content artdeco-dropdown--is-dropdown-element artdeco-dropdown__content--has-arrow artdeco-dropdown__content--arrow-right artdeco-dropdown__content--justification-right artdeco-dropdown__content--placement-bottom ember-view" id="ember6248" tabindex="-1"><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6249" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6250" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6251"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Every industry is economically hurting from the COVID-19 pandemic. Millions of people are remaining on lockdown or, even worst, they are losing their jobs. Within the software industry, having high attrition levels can mean major cost implications. Each time a person leaves a project, you lose productivity and resources have to train a new person to take over. Companies that have a focus-client mindset are more likely to take care of their employees. Consider a software company that also focuses on strategies to maintain these levels very low so your project won't be affected. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653669332763144192">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6653669332763144192">#outsourcing</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-6296="6296" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6276" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6277" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6278"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Being alone at home can difficult communication. You don't have your colleague next to you or your daily meetings might be postponed. If written communication is the most common used tool during these days, make sure the idea is clear and accurate. Send the message only if you're sure there are no misunderstandings. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6647861328457330688">#WeStayAtHome</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6335" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6336" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6337"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">In these COVID-19 times where companies have been forced to change the way they work, some of them might be evaluating making a twist in their outsourcing strategies. Is this time to look into another location? Many markets are facing total lockdowns and software projects might have important delays due to technical issues. Nearshore software companies are 100% technically prepared to non-stop your business's productivity. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=nearshore&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651146248621473793">#nearshore</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=outsourcing&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651146248621473793">#outsourcing</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=softwaredevelopment&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6651146248621473793">#softwaredevelopment</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Experts say that 20-minute morning coffee or afternoon exercise, can put you in the right working mindset. Not talking with your colleagues and sometimes not even standing up from the chair can make things worse. Let your mind go blank for a few minutes. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6649320245779537920">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workingremotely&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6649320245779537920">#workingremotely</a></span></span>
</span>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6362" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6363" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6364"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Buy yourself or bring from the office the right monitor, webcam, headset, mouse, keyboard, and an extra USB hub &amp; dock, these will definitely help you during your home office days. Wake up a couple of minutes early every morning and make sure everything is running and working properly. You will have a smooth day! <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648600720822071296">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workfromhome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648600720822071296">#workfromhome</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=productive&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6648600720822071296">#productive</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6308" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6309" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6310"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">If you're trying to be productive, these "home office" days are not the excuse for not to. Set one specific room and avoid working from the bed. Get ready, as every morning, get dressed, and make yourself comfortable to start your work with the right foot. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646793987313188864">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=productivity&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646793987313188864">#productivity</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workingremotely&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646793987313188864">#workingremotely</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>

<!-- --> <div class="feed-shared-update-v2__description-wrapper ember-view" id="ember6451" style=""><div class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text feed-shared-update-v2__description feed-shared-inline-show-more-text--minimal-padding ember-view" id="ember6452" tabindex="-1"> <div class="feed-shared-text relative feed-shared-update-v2__commentary ember-view" dir="ltr" id="ember6453"><!-- -->
<span class="break-words">
<span><span dir="ltr">Like many organizations, Hexacta has temporarily shifted to working remotely, due to the novel coronavirus (COVID-19). How can we maintain ourselves productive during these days? Our first tip: make sure your team is doing well and working as if they were at the office. <a data-attribute-index="0" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=westayathome&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646063491809628160">#WeStayAtHome</a> <a data-attribute-index="1" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=productive&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646063491809628160">#productive</a> <a data-attribute-index="2" href="https://www.linkedin.com/feed/hashtag/?keywords=workingremotely&amp;highlightedUpdateUrns=urn%3Ali%3Aactivity%3A6646063491809628160">#workingremotely</a></span></span>
</span>
</div>
<button aria-hidden="true" class="feed-shared-inline-show-more-text__see-more-less-toggle see-more t-14 t-black--light t-normal hoverable-link-text" data-control-name="commentary_expand" data-ember-action="" data-ember-action-6468="6468" type="button">…ver mais</button><!-- --></div>

    Visualizar tradução
</span></button>
